amendment.description: To require a State's report card to include information on the graduation rates of homeless children and children in foster care.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2169 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 56 - 40. Record Vote Number: 233.

action.text: Amendment SA 2169 proposed by Senator Bennet for Senator Booker to Amendment SA 2089. (consideration: CR S5033, S5034-5035; text: CR S5033) To require a State's report card to include information on the graduation rates of homeless children and children in foster care.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 2169 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 56 - 40. Record Vote Number: 233.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2169 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 56 - 40. Record Vote Number: 233.
